attributes.action: protect the lives of members of the royal family and other prominent people by making it illegal to follow a moving vehicle on UK roads with intent to photograph or film the occupants of that vehicle without their permission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The dangers of aggressive paparazzi following moving vehicles are well known. Such laws are difficult to frame but this behaviour is a form of stalking and - regardless of your view of the royal family - it is in the public interest to restrict it.
